author: tross
msg: Refactored the QMF engine to adhere to the following rules regarding
1) Impl classes have constructors matching the public constructors
2) Additional Impl constructors are accessed through a static factory function
3) All linkages to objects are to the public object
4) If a back-link (from Impl to public) is needed, the Impl class must be
5) All public classes have non-default copy constructors that make a copy of the

author: gnodet
msg: [karaf] rename gshell to shell and rename submodules to avoid having the parent module name in their names

author: dwoods
msg: OPENJPA-1310 SQLServer requires JAXB marshalled XML to be in UTF-16 instead of UTF-8.  Also updated some of the XmlElement names to match the case used in the XmlType annotation.
